message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.CR 

This paper addresses the problem of person re-identification, which is a subfield of computer vision. The paper proposes a boosting-based approach to learn a correspondence structure, which is a common technique in machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI). The approach also involves handling spatial misalignments, which is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV, cs.MM). Finally, the paper also discusses the use of a global constraint-based matching process, which is related to computer security (cs.CR). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV, followed by cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, and cs.CR.
